name: @atomiton/storage
description: Universal storage abstraction for Blueprints and application data across platforms

scripts.kill: echo 'No processes to kill for Storage package'
scripts.test:smoke: vitest run src/**/*.smoke.test.{ts,tsx} --passWithNoTests || echo "No smoke tests yet"
scripts.test:e2e: echo "No E2E tests for this package"
scripts.test:all: pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:smoke && pnpm test:benchmark && pnpm test:e2e
